task.title: Making Vegan Apple Pie Oatmeal
task.shortdesc: This filling, delicious, and nutritious breakfast is perfect for these chilly fall mornings in Blacksburg!

taskbody.prereq:
Make sure you have all the ingredients. You'll need:
1/2 cup old fashioned oats
1 1/4 cups vanilla almond milk
3 dates
1 apple
2 tsp. cinnamon

step.cmd: Heat the vanilla almond milk to a boil over medium heat
Slice the dates and apples into small, uniform pieces

substep.cmd: Set some of the dates and apples aside for later.

step.cmd: Add the oats, almonds, and dates and stir well.
Orient the easy-lock lid with ingredient spout slightly right of center.
Reduce the heat to medium-low and cook the oats according to the box instructions and until the apples are soft.
Pour the oatmeal into a bowl to serve, and garnish with the leftover apples and dates.
